function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Monitoring compliance using ai and internet-connected devices may infringe on privacy rights and civil liberties of citizens.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Predicting the spread of coronavirus and planning healthcare capacity based on data analysis may result in insufficient consideration of social and behavioral factors that influence disease transmission.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of ai and big data for coronavirus testing and patient screening","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Remote diagnosis and monitoring of covid-19 patients using voice analysis","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Deployment of predictive analytics for identifying severity of disease and patient triage","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of centralized database for coronavirus research","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of location and proximity data for contact tracing","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of cellphone location data for contact tracing","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on social media and public data for disease trend analysis presents a risk of inaccurate or biased data leading to incorrect alerts and responses.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Privacy and data security risks associated with contact tracing apps and ai-powered video analytics tools, as they collect and process sensitive personal information.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Health data collection from fitness trackers and vital signs monitoring raises concerns about data accuracy, reliability, and potential misuse.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of ai-based tools for triaging and managing covid-19 patients","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Collection and utilization of anonymous user movement data for contact tracing","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Integration of automated chatbots for official information transmission","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of ai in predicting patient outcomes and disease diagnosis","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Remote monitoring of covid-19 patients","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of data analytics for tracking population flow","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Collection of personal health data for public health analysis and monitoring","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Prediction and tracking of virus spread based on location data","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of ai to assess and predict disease transmission","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of cognitive computing and ai for covid-19 diagnosis","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Data mining and analytics for covid-19 research","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Graph analytics for identifying relationships in scientific publications","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Utilization of ai models for covid-19 predictions and drug discovery","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Consolidation of biomedical data for predictive drug combination therapies","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases due to inadequate surveillance and control measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Privacy concerns and ethical implications of using big data and location tracking","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Dependence on technology for disease control and surveillance","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Monitoring the movement of passengers from the worst-hit city of wuhan","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Creation of a smartphone app giving color codes to citizens based on contagion risk","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Deployment of ai-based temperature scanners in railway stations and subways","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ambiguity and lack of understanding about the virus strain, behavior, and transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Centralization and analysis of unstructured or disorganized data","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Dependence on early risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate collaboration among academic, industrial, and government sectors","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Highly contagious nature of covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of vaccine and medications against covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential risk of virus transmission through people-to-people contact in healthcare settings.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Possible data security and privacy risks associated with iot sensors collecting patient data.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential risk of misdiagnosis and reliance on ai for disease monitoring and decision-making.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of robotics for meal preparation and sanitization may lead to cross-contamination if not properly managed.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Drones transporting medical equipment and samples may encounter technical malfunctions or errors, leading to delays or loss of critical supplies.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of facial recognition and big data for monitoring citizens raises privacy and surveillance concerns.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of security testing and protocols leading to unauthorized breaches","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate device management leading to system inefficiency","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Poor maintenance of networking equipment leading to connectivity issues","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Healthcare workers not using personal protective equipment ppe","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of coronavirus vaccine","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"}]}
